author: Daniel Greene
description:
Go to https://tryfum.com/DANIELGREENE or scan the QR code and use code DANIELGREENE to get your free FÜM Topper when you order your Journey Pack today. This week in Fantasy News, a brand-new author scandal has rocked the publishing world. Boundless (formerly Unbound) is going under, and authors are being left unpaid—some even selling personal stock to recover losses. I break down everything we know and highlight how fans can support the affected writers.
A new publisher scandal hits—Boundless (formerly Unbound) collapses, authors left unpaid, and some forced to sell personal stock to stay afloat.

Warner Bros. Discovery splits in two—streaming/studios separate from cable networks in a major corporate restructuring.

Disney completes Hulu buyout—pays an additional $438.7M for NBCUniversal’s stake, aiming for tighter integration with Disney+ and ESPN.

Devine Rivals secured a movie deal.

2024 Nebula Award winners revealed.

Dresden Files debuts on GraphicAudio.

Showrunner named for Ma
title: Boundless Publishing Theft EXPLAINED ⚠️ Warner Brothers Splitting & Hulu Bought | FN
